properties.entry: SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#seletAllNovel() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.webnovel.model.dao.WebNovelDAO#selectWebNovelDetail() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , B.CHAPTER_NUM , B.WEB_NOV_CONTENT FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A JOIN WEB_NOV_DETAIL B ON (A.WEB_NOV_NUM = B.WEB_NOV_NUM) WHERE B.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
